settings.Name: Archipelago
settings.Description:
A maze of islands of different sizes and shapes. Players start with more wood.

An archipelago, sometimes called an island group, is a chain or cluster of islands. Archipelagos may be found isolated in bodies of water or neighboring a large land mass. For example, Scotland has more than 700 islands surrounding its mainland which constitute an archipelago. Archipelagos are often volcanic, forming along island arcs generated by subduction zones or hotspots, but may also be the result of erosion, deposition and land elevation.
